proverbs.snippet: Let the wise listen and add to their learning.
The fear of the Lord is the beginning of wisdom.
How much better to get wisdom than gold!

declarations: I receive the spirit of wisdom and revelation in the knowledge of Christ.
My mind is renewed, and I discern the will of the Lord.

proverbs.snippet: With me are riches and honor, enduring wealth and prosperity.
Lazy hands make for poverty, but diligent hands bring wealth.
A good person leaves an inheritance for their children's children.

declarations: The blessing of the Lord makes me rich and adds no sorrow.
I steward resources in righteousness and generosity.

proverbs.snippet: Fear the Lord and shun evil. This will bring health to your body.
They are life to those who find them and health to one's whole body.
A cheerful heart is good medicine, but a crushed spirit dries up the bones.

declarations: By His stripes I am healed and sustained.
My body is a temple of the Holy Spirit, strong and protected.

proverbs.snippet: Then you will win favor and a good name in the sight of God and man.
Through the blessing of the upright a city is exalted.
One who loves a pure heart and gracious speech will have the king for a friend.

declarations: The Lord enlarges my influence for His purposes.
My words carry grace, truth, and authority.
